text: Dang ren zaoyu buxing shi, ta jiu qiqiu ta de zhu [an la] bing gui xin ta [qie xiang ta huizui]. Ranhou, dang ta [an la] ciyu ta [ren] enhui shi, ta [ren] bian wangjile ta yiqian suo qiqiu de, bing gei an la shezhi xuduo [yu an la tongdeng de] chongbai duixiang, yibian you ren beili ta [an la] de dao. Ni shuo:“Ni zhanshi xiangshou ni de bu xin ba! Ni que shi huo yu de fanren.”
